summary: A full-featured media platform admin dashboard with CRUD for Movies, Podcasts, Videos, Clips, Series, Channels, Live TV, Brands, Ads, and Stripe integration. Master Admin has full access including premium and can grant premium to other admins. Auto-clip generation (4-5 sec clips) from existing video/movie content triggered by admins.
architectural_notes: Master Admin role has full platform access including premium; can delegate premium to other admins
Live TV implemented via HLS stream URL embed (admins paste stream URLs)
Auto-clip generation produces 4-5 second clips from video/movie content, admin-triggered
known_issues: All admin dashboard sections (Movies, Podcasts, Videos, Clips, Series, Channels, Live TV, Brands, Ads, Stripe) failing to create, upload, or configure

existing_features.title: Fix the Movies management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully create/upload new movies (with metadata and file blobs), edit existing movies, and delete movies without errors.

Fix the Podcasts management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully create/upload new podcasts (with metadata, video blob, and thumbnail blob), edit existing podcasts, and delete podcasts without errors.

Fix the Videos management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully create/upload new videos (with metadata including genre, roles, release year, optional trailer), edit existing videos, and delete videos without errors.

Fix the Clips management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully create clips manually (with caption, video source reference, and optional thumbnail), edit clip captions, and delete clips without errors.

Add auto-clip generation functionality in the admin dashboard: admins can select an existing movie or video content item and trigger auto-generation of 4–5 second clips from it. The backend should extract or record clip segments of 4–5 seconds duration from the selected content and save them as clip records linked to the source content.

Fix the Series management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully create new TV series with seasons and episodes (including thumbnail and trailer uploads), edit series, and delete series without errors.

Fix the Channels management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully create new live TV channels (with name, logo, and original-content flag), edit existing channels, and delete channels without errors.

Fix the Live TV management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully create and configure Live TV programs by pasting in HLS stream URLs, set schedules, and manage live TV entries without errors.
Fix the Brands management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully create new brands, assign films/series/clips/live channels to brands, and delete brands without errors.

Fix the Ads management section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully upload ad media files and create ad assignments (global or targeted, with position/skip/display settings) without errors.

Fix the Stripe configuration section in the admin dashboard so that admins can successfully enter a Stripe secret key and allowed countries, save the configuration, and see the current configuration status without errors.

Ensure the Master Admin role automatically has full platform access including premium content access. The Master Admin must be able to grant premium access to other admin users from the MasterAdminManagement panel.

Audit and fix all React Query mutation hooks in useQueries.ts for every admin section (Movies, Podcasts, Videos, Clips, Series, Channels, Live TV, Brands, Ads, Stripe). Ensure each mutation correctly calls the backend actor method, handles errors gracefully with user-facing error messages, and invalidates the relevant query cache on success.
